page.title: 16EVERTON FOOTBALL CLUB.
page.content: {Everton}were the best team this year,they have played great football against other sides,even against {Liverpool,}which is my team.They were the{League Champions and European Cup {Winners Cup}winners beating{Rapid {Vienna}in{Rotterdam,}a brilliant match that everyone enjoyed. The{Everton player I like is{Peter Reid.}He is a smashing player who was voted player of the year.{Everton}had a side that was unstoppable this year.They were winning nearly all their matches. {Everton}could have also done a treble but{Manchester United}stopped them by winning the{F.A.Cup. Everton}can now enter the{European Cup}but because of the terrible incident in{Brussels where a lot of people were killed,the team have been banned. I think it is a shame as it was the{Liverpool}fans who helped cause the trouble.{(Carl)
